name: Almost Abstract Painting Erps
description: I painted Erps with the idea of exploring form and color and creating an image combining reality with the imagined. This painting is about metamorphoses—persons, places and things becoming other realities nearing abstraction. Erps is an idea that’s somewhat hidden, but through insight, inspection and interpretation, one can get the gist. Erps is acrylic on canvas and measures 10”X 15”, 25.4 cm X 38 .1 cm approx.  This painting is stretched on heavy-duty stretcher bars.

name: Andy Warhol Inspired Painted Display Shoes
description: I painted this pair of shoes for Barneys New York Happy Andy Warholidays Christmas windows in 2006. Each Shoe is hand painted with Warhol imagery inspired from his 1950’s illustrations, this pair features holly, ornaments and a tattooed lady. I am selling them in pairs but do not recommend wearing them, buckles zippers and interiors of the shoes have been painted as well. Most have a protective coating of polyurethane. These shoes are collectible, conversation pieces for decorative use. This pair of boots is size 6 but once again they are not wearable.

name: One Of A Kind Hand Painted Mannequin Head Display Form / Objet D’Art
description: I hand painted this mannequin head display form for Barneys New York Coop stores worldwide. Before being painted the mannequin head was découpaged, which lends it a papier-mâché appearance. After painting, a light staining is applied giving the form a vintage quality. The head is then coated with a polyurethane or varnish for protection. This head form can be used in a store, home, office, showroom or dressing room to display hats, scarves, or what have you. Because of Its unique charm and whimsical decorative quality you may simply display the head alone as an objet d'art. This heads name is Alan his measurements are 18" tall by 9" wide, 45.7 cm X 22.9 cm approx.

name: Bonnie Miss March
description:
This painting is one of a series I painted earlier this decade. The series is called Nudies. With Nudies I painted male and female nude models that I found in various vintage magazines. I painted these vintage models on flat fields of color, in order to contrast the quasi-realistic painting style that I rendered them in. The monotone backdrop lends these caricatures a Pop Art quality reminiscent of the decades they are taken from.  
Bonnie Miss March is acrylic on canvas and measures 12”X 22”, 30.5 cm X 55.9 cm approx.  This painting is stretched on heavy-duty stretcher bars.

name: The Fugitive Kind T Shirt
description:
In this wild film by Sidney Lumet , Joanne Woodward plays the mascara smeared, Jukin’, lewd vagrant, Carol Cutrere. Miss Cutrere is a symbol of freedom and rebellion who poetically ends this surreal tale by Tennessee Williams with this smokin' line:
"Wild things leave skins behind.... They leave clean skins and teeth and white bones, and these are tokens passed from one to another so that the fugitive kind can follow their kind." 
The Fugitive Kind is hand screened with abandon on an American Apparel all cotton t shirt. Black ink on white t shirt, mens size large.
